txt.en: The Deep Dark
Arvaethor has been captured by a band of ruthless dead and corrupt White Mountain Orcs
Defeat Orcs in Nimrond cavern ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'The Orc cavern we entered on the eastern slope seemed to delve deep into the mountain. This crevasse may contain passage to the other encampment.\n\n'You have done much and we have made it this far. I shall enter the mountain before you and scout out the passage. Enter after I do and make sure you are not followed. We shall meet up again shortly.'
Search deeper into the caverns of Nimrond for Arvaethor
Defeated ruthless dead in Nimrond cavern ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Orc in Nimrond cavern ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The western entrance to Nimrond is located atop the mountain encampment of DÃ¢r Matum.\n\nEnter the western side of the Nimrond caverns.
Orcs and ruthless dead can be found in the caverns of Nimrond.\n\nDefeat ruthless dead and Orcs within the caverns of Nimrond.
DNT
After taking the camp, Arvaethor has asked you to follow him into the maw of the mountain and stop the source of the monsters descending into the Vale.

'I was foolish to delve into the darkness alone and let the enemy capture me. I care deeply for my home and you have done so much to help it. I do not wish for you to die for this land. I only ask that you accompany me for one last fight.'
Arvaethor is located somewhere in the caverns of Nimrond.\n\nSearch deeper into the caverns of Nimrond for Arvaethor.
Defeat ruthless dead in Nimrond cavern ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Arvaethor cane be found in the western chamber of the Nimrond caverns.\n\nYou should rescue Arvaethor.

'I was foolish to delve into the darkness alone and let the enemy capture me. I care deeply for my home and you have done so much to help it. I do not wish for you to die for this land. I only ask that you accompany me for one last fight.'
Arvaethor is nowhere to be found. Perhaps he already went further into the caves
